thread.section_title: GOV.UK departments and policy - all updates
thread.title: Guidance: The Eatwell Guide

title: Guidance: The Eatwell Guide
text: 28 February 2017, see all updates The Eatwell Guide is a policy tool used to define government recommendations on eating healthily and achieving a balanced diet.
